full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGROL DKAR YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO SGO NAS TSOGS 'KHOR BYAS PAS TSUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(ZHES SGROL DKAR DANG 'BREL BA'I TSOGS 'KHOR BYA TSUL 'DI NI, TSE SGRUB MJUG TU, YON MCHOD RNAMS KYI TSE BSOD RGYAS PA'I RTEN 'BREL DU CHAR CHU GROGS LTAR, CHOS BRGYAD KYI 'KHOR LO NGO BOR GYI NAR 'KHYAMS PA'I SNYOMS LAS PA DPAL LTUNG MING CAN GYIS SMRAS YIG GZUGS SU BKOD PA NI RNAM DPYOD @002B YANGS PA'I DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG BRTZON GRUS SO, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
